name: Fallen (itch) (Lena Taylor, Dogen)
description:
Fallen is a 2D platformer made by students of Full Sail University as a part of their degree program. The game was based on the original Castlevania for NES, but was made to mix elements of that game with new ideas.

FEATURES:

  • Five full length levels and a tutorial
  • Platforming and combat inspired by the original Castlevania
  • Subweapons to quickly take care of foes
  • Halos that grant temporary flight

BACKSTORY:

You play as an angel with a hunger for power and violence. Due to their wicked nature, they were stripped of their wings and cast down to hell. As the fallen angel, you must navigate the dangers of hell in hopes of escape.
